report.title: UKBMS specific species and occurrence counts by site
report.description: UKBMS specific Lists locations and the number of species and occurrences within them. This report includes the location code, and relies on the record being input with a link to the site and will not pick up records where the spatial reference is in the site boundary but without a direct reference to the site.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations_websites lw JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id and l.deleted=false AND (l.code = '' OR l.code IS NULL OR '#blank_code#'!='yes') LEFT JOIN (locations section JOIN cache_occurrences o on o.location_id=section.id AND o.zero_abundance='f' ) on section.parent_id=l.id #joins# WHERE lw.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND l.location_type_id = #location_type_id#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
